item.title: Speed up your Oracle Database provisioning with Docker and Ansible
item.description: Warming up before AMIS 25th Conference event where I will be presenting with my friend and colleague Arturo Viveros (@gugalnikov) about Oracle SOA Suite provisioning, I want to share some practices that help us to provide Oracle Database instances between developers and improve our productivity.

item.title: Oracle SOA Suite 12c Docker Image
item.description: After find some limitations on building SOA Docker image using Dockerfile (as volume access, default size image) I researched on how to improve building process and I found Packer (from the same guy that creates Vagrant).

item.title: Oracle Fusion Middleware Chef Cookbook - New Release!
item.description: Yesterday, I released a new version (0.2.0) of my Oracle Fusion Middleware Cookbook hosted on Chef Supermarket

item.title: Docker image for Oracle SOA Suite 12c
item.description: Cool news came from Oracle a couple of weeks ago: Oracle WebLogic Server is now supported on Docker!.

item.title: Running Oracle BPM 12c on AWS using Vagrant and Chef
item.description: In this post, I will show how to create an AWS EC2 Instance with an Oracle BPM 12c Quickstart Domain created. And I will use previous post for related tasks.

item.title: Chef Cookbook for Oracle Fusion Middleware 12c
item.description: Provisioning tools have change the way we create software environments: How much time we spend installing OS, databases, configuring platforms, applications? Now you can translate this steps into code, getting the software development benefits and challenges into infrastructure: versioning, reuse, continuous improvement.

item.title: Book Review - Applied SOA Patterns on the Oracle Platform
item.description: I’ve had the opportunity to present a review of this book Applied SOA Patterns on the Oracle Platform.
